explanation: [0-0] In front of a wall illuminated in blue light, there's a billboard with a blue luminous strip, displaying the word "POLON" in white.

[0-2] The camera then moves to reveal that this is in a hallway. The blue billboard displays "POLONESIOS" in white. As the camera pans right, another similarly shaped billboard with green lighting appears, displaying text in various colors.

[0-2] The camera then moves to reveal that this is in a hallway. The blue billboard displays "POLONESIOS" in white. As the camera pans right, another similarly shaped billboard with green lighting appears, displaying text in various colors.

[2-4] The camera then moves through the hallway with a white ceiling and black and white tiled floor, where many people in diverse attire are present. Reaching the end of the hallway, the camera enters an open white door, revealing a room set up for an interview. Many people in black shirts are behind cameras, facing three individuals sitting on a sofa. On the left is a woman with two-toned pigtails wearing a purple dress. In the middle is a woman with black hair streaked with yellow-green, wearing grey attire and silver pants. On the right is a man in a blue shirt and blue pants, with olive-green dyed hair and blue hair. Behind them, a black promotional board displays the same lettering as the billboards in the hallway. Under their feet is a red carpet with white lines.
